content: Yes, the sample used in "Blow the Whistle" from Zapp & Roger's song "Blow Your Whistle" was later used in other songs by various artists. For example, the sample appeared in Lil Wayne's 2008 song "Playing With Fire" and Nelly's 2010 song "Tippin' in da Club." The sample has also been used by other artists in different genres, such as The Chemical Brothers and The Game.
